SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.model

Class Question

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.model.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a question in the exam system, including its ID, title, multiple choice options, correct answer, and point value.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Question(int id, String title, String a, String b, String c, String d, String answer, Type type, int points)
    Constructs a Question instance with the specified details.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getA()
    Returns the text of the first answer option.
    String
    getAnswer()
    Returns the correct answer option (either 'a', 'b', 'c', or 'd').

    Returns the text of the second answer option.

    Returns the text of the third answer option.

    Returns the number of points this question is worth.

    Returns the type of the question (either "Single" or "Multiple").
    boolean
    isMultiple()
    Determines whether this question is a multiple-choice question (i.e., has multiple correct answers).

    Determines whether this question is a single-choice question (i.e., has a single correct answer).

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question(int id, String title, String a, String b, String c, String d, String answer, Type type, int points)
      Constructs a Question instance with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the question
      title - the title or text of the question
      a - the text of the first answer option
      b - the text of the second answer option
      c - the text of the third answer option
      d - the text of the fourth answer option
      answer - the correct answer option (can be a letter: 'a', 'b', 'c', or 'd')
      type - the type of the question (single or multiple)
      points - the number of points this question is worth

    • isSingle

      public boolean isSingle()
      Determines whether this question is a single-choice question (i.e., has a single correct answer).
      Returns:
      true if the answer is a single option (a, b, c, or d); false if it is multiple-choice

    • isMultiple

      public boolean isMultiple()
      Determines whether this question is a multiple-choice question (i.e., has multiple correct answers).
      Returns:
      true if the question is multiple-choice; false if it is a single-choice question
